item.title: Indiana rallies to stay unbeaten in 'improbable' win
item.description: No. 2 Indiana scores with 36 seconds remaining to avoid its first loss of the season and beat Penn State 27-24.

item.title: Elko bristles at past, urges 9-0 Aggies to 'finish'
item.description: Texas A&M keeps defying its recent history of weak finishes, scoring another road win and moving to 9-0 for the first time since 1992 with Saturday's ...

item.title: Boozer twins start strong in debut for No. 6 Duke
item.description: Cameron and Cayden Boozer thrived in their freshman debut at Duke, with Cameron going for 25 points, 8 rebounds and 5 assists in a blowout win.

item.title: Messi's brace leads Miami to 1st playoff series win
item.description: Lionel Messi's first-half brace propelled Inter Miami to a 4-0 victory over Nashville SC to advance in the MLS playoffs for the first time in club his...

item.title: Kawhi to miss 'next few games' with ankle sprain
item.description: Kawhi Leonard will miss "the next few games" due to a sprained ankle but the injury doesn't seem serious, according to coach Tyronn Lue.
